hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Printing System config details sh ~/Documents/config_details.sh
cd ~/Documents;cd compilerNightly rm -rf ocl-conformance.zip conformanc* wget http://compute-artifactory.amd.com/artifactory/rocm-generic-local/amd/lightning-support-files/ocl-conformance.zip unzip ocl-conformance.zip # Adding below line for checking [Lenine] tar xvzf conformance-1730747-lnx64* cd conformance/2.0 ./run_conformance.py opencl_conformance_tests_wimpyfull.csv > conformance_2.0_WF.log 2>&1
